meanings.definition: A square piece of cloth worn around the neck.
meanings.sent1: She tied her colorful neckerchiefs around her neck.
meanings.sent2: The cowboy's neckerchiefs added a touch of style to his outfit.
meanings.sent3: The neckerchiefs danced in the wind as she walked.
meanings.sent4: His collection of neckerchiefs was a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the neckerchiefs felt comforting against her skin.

meanings.sent1: He neckerchiefs every day to complete his look.
meanings.sent2: She neckerchiefs with confidence, knowing it suits her.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to neckerchiefs a tiny scarf around its neck.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the actor will neckerchiefs as part of the costume.
meanings.sent5: Neckercieffing can be a fun way to accessorize an outfit.
